name: Stickybear Family Fun Game
overview: Stickybear: Family Fun - Games is a children's title based on Richard Hefter's Stickybear character. Unlike other Stickybear licensees which are more educative in character this game is all about having fun. The game offers a variety of mini-games such as Hangman, Tic Tac Toe and Hippity Hop, a peg jumping game. All the games are accompanied with familiar Stickybear characters which are fully animated and accompanied with amusing sound effects.
